mapper.select: select GOODS_ID,GOODS_NAME,GOODS_NAME_EN,GOODS_SELL_PRICE,(select s.parameter_value from sys_parameter_config s where s.parameter_code='goods_img')||DETAIL_MODEL_ONE DETAIL_MODEL_ONE, DETAILS_INTRO_URL,fabric_name from app_goods s where s.main_style=#{value} and s.up_off_shelf='Y' and s.delete_flag='N' order by s.app_index_order
select s.node_code code ,s.node_name name from sys_data_struct_node s where s.struct_code='app_goods' and s.parent_node_code='G' and s.enabled_flag='Y' order by s.display_order

SELECT spd.parameter_code, spd.parameter_name, spc.parameter_value description FROM sys_parameter_define spd INNER JOIN sys_parameter_config spc ON spd.parameter_code = spc.parameter_code WHERE spd.parameter_type = 'app_show_type_and_num' ORDER BY spd.show_order

select GOODS_ID, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_NAME_EN, GOODS_SELL_PRICE, CONCAT((SELECT parameter_value FROM sys_parameter_config WHERE parameter_code = 'fabric_img'), DETAIL_MODEL_ONE ) detailModelOne, DETAILS_INTRO_URL, fabric_name from app_goods s where 1 = 1 and s.up_off_shelf ='Y' and s.main_style = #{main_style} and s.APP_INDEX_SHOW='Y' and s.delete_flag='N'
order by s.app_index_order LIMIT 0, #{quantity}
